data.name: The Sinking City - Investigator Pack
data.detailed_description: Upgrade your gaming experience with an exclusive private investigator outfit, permanent access to a first aid kit, antipsychotics and a crafting materials starter pack.
data.about_the_game: Upgrade your gaming experience with an exclusive private investigator outfit, permanent access to a first aid kit, antipsychotics and a crafting materials starter pack.
data.short_description: Upgrade your gaming experience with an exclusive private investigator outfit, permanent access to a first aid kit, antipsychotics and a crafting materials starter pack.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4350 @3,6 GHz/AMD Phenom X6 @ 3 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760 GTX, 2048 Mb/ATI R9 380X, 2048 Mb
  • DirectX: Version 11
